meta.title: Marketing Tools Collection - Practical Marketing Tools
meta.description: Provides various tools for marketers including UTM generator, YouTube comment and thumbnail extractor, URL shortener, and more.
meta.keywords: UTM Generator, YouTube Comment Extractor, Thumbnail Extractor, Marketing Tools, URL Shortener, Marketing Analytics
meta.ogDescription: Essential tools for marketers! Use UTM generator, YouTube tools, URL shortener, and more features for free.

utm.title: UTM Generator
utm.description: Generate UTM codes easily for tracking and analyzing links from different marketing channels.

head.title: UTM Generator - Marketing Tools
head.description: Generate UTM tags quickly and easily. Process multiple sources and mediums at once with this free UTM generator.

url.label: Landing Page URL
url.placeholder: Enter the full URL including http:// or https://

errors.urlRequired: Please enter a landing page URL
errors.sourceOrMediumRequired: Please select at least one source and one medium

youtube.title: YouTube Thumbnail Extractor
youtube.description: Extract thumbnail images from YouTube videos in various resolutions.

head.title: YouTube Thumbnail Extractor - Marketing Tools
head.description: Extract YouTube video thumbnails in various resolutions.

youtubeTime.title: YouTube Timestamp URL Generator
youtubeTime.description: Generate URLs that jump to specific timestamps in YouTube videos.

head.title: YouTube Timestamp URL Generator - Marketing Tools
head.description: Generate URLs that jump to specific timestamps in YouTube videos.

youtubeComments.title: YouTube Comment Extractor
youtubeComments.description: Export YouTube video comments to Excel files.

head.title: YouTube Comment Extractor - Marketing Tools
head.description: Export YouTube video comments to Excel files.

limits.comments: ⚡ You can collect up to 2,000 comments per request. (Daily limit: {used} of {limit} uses)
limits.quota: Collection may stop regardless of your limit depending on total user usage. Please try again tomorrow.
limits.policy: Even for videos with over 2,000 comments, not all comments may be collected due to YouTube's comment policy.

errors.dailyLimit: Daily limit ({limit} uses) exceeded. Please try again tomorrow.
errors.quotaExceeded: YouTube API daily quota exceeded. Please try again tomorrow.

info.total: Collecting top 2,000 comments {sortType} out of {count} total comments.{repliesNote}

url.title: URL Shortener
url.description: Simplify management and sharing by shortening long URLs.

head.title: URL Shortener - Marketing Tools
head.description: Shorten long URLs simply and easily.

text.title: Text Analyzer
text.description: Check and analyze text character count and bytes in real-time.

head.title: Text Analyzer - Marketing Tools
head.description: Check total characters, characters excluding spaces, and byte count in real-time.

byteStandard.title: Byte Calculation Standard
byteStandard.korean: Korean: 2 or 3 bytes depending on encoding

encoding.title: Korean Bytes by Encoding
encoding.utf8: UTF-8: 3 bytes (Variable length encoding for efficient Unicode processing)
encoding.utf16: UTF-16: 2 bytes (Processes all Unicode characters as 2 bytes)

platform.title: Platform Standards
platform.google: Google/Facebook Ads: Character count only (bytes irrelevant)

analytics.title: Ad Performance Analytics
analytics.description: Analyze and measure key advertising metrics including ROAS, CPC, and CTR.

head.title: Ad Performance Analytics - Marketing Tools
head.description: Analyze and measure key advertising metrics including ROAS, CPC, and CTR.

roas.title: ROAS Analysis
roas.description: ROAS (Return On Ad Spend) shows the ratio of revenue to advertising cost. For example, ROAS of 500% means $5 in revenue for every $1 spent on advertising.

efficiency.title: Ad Efficiency Analysis
descriptions: • CPC (Cost Per Click): Average cost per click
• CPM (Cost Per Mile): Cost per thousand impressions
• CTR (Click Through Rate): Ratio of clicks to impressions

conversion.title: Conversion Analysis
descriptions: • CVR (Conversion Rate): Visitor to conversion ratio
• CPA (Cost Per Action): Cost per conversion

wordCloud.title: Word Cloud Generator
wordCloud.description: Generate word clouds visualizing word frequency from text analysis.

head.title: Word Cloud Generator - Marketing Tools
head.description: Generate word clouds visualizing word frequency from text analysis.

stopword.label: Stopword Settings
stopword.subLabel: (Add words to exclude from the analysis)

errors.emptyStopWord: Please enter a word to exclude

colors.title: Color Tools
colors.description: Find and utilize perfect color combinations.

colorSelect.title: Color Selection
colorSelect.description: Click the main color to use the picker or use the 'Random' button to select a new color.

codeCopy.title: Copy Code
codeCopy.description: Click on colors to automatically copy their HEX values to clipboard.

palette.title: Palette Use
palette.description: Check and utilize the automatically generated color palette.

basic.title: Basic Palette
basic.description: Variations with adjusted brightness and saturation of the selected color

complementary.title: Complementary Colors
complementary.description: Colors opposite each other on the color wheel

splitComplementary.title: Split Complementary
splitComplementary.description: Soft contrast using colors adjacent to the complement

analogous.title: Analogous Colors
analogous.description: Natural harmony from neighboring colors on the wheel

triadic.title: Triadic Colors
triadic.description: Balanced harmony of three colors 120 degrees apart

tetradic.title: Tetradic Colors
tetradic.description: Various combinations of four colors 90 degrees apart

head.title: Privacy Policy - Marketing Tools
head.description: This is the privacy policy page for Marketing Tool Box.

privacyPolicyPage.title: Privacy Policy
privacyPolicyPage.intro: Marketing Tools (hereinafter referred to as the 'Site') respects the privacy of users and has the following policy to comply with relevant laws and regulations.

section1.title: 1. Information Collected
section1.content1: The site provides services free of charge without separate membership registration, and collects only minimal information:
section1.item1: Automatically collected information: visit history, IP address
section1.item2: Site usage statistics through Google Analytics
section1.item3: Cookie information to provide advertising services

section2.title: 2. Purpose of Collection
section2.item1: Understanding site usage status and improving service

section3.title: 3. Use of Cookies
section3.content: This site uses cookies to provide Google Analytics and advertising services. You can refuse the use of cookies in your browser settings, but in this case, the use of some services may be restricted.

section4.title: 4. Information Security
section4.content: The site takes the following basic security measures to protect users' personal information:
section4.item2: Limiting the collection of data containing personal information

section5.title: 5. Contact
section5.content: If you have any questions about the Privacy Policy, please contact us by email:

section6.title: 6. Changes to Privacy Policy
section6.content: This Privacy Policy is effective from December 1, 2024, and any changes will be notified through the site.

head.title: Terms of Service - Marketing Tools
head.description: This is the terms of service page for Marketing Tool Box.

termsOfServicePage.title: Terms of Service
termsOfServicePage.intro: These terms and conditions govern your use of the services provided by Marketing Tools (hereinafter referred to as the 'Site').

section1.title: 1. Purpose
section1.content: The purpose of these terms is to define the terms and procedures for using all services provided by the site, as well as the rights, obligations, and responsibilities of users and the site.

section2.title: 2. Use of Service
section2.item1: The site provides services free of charge without separate membership registration.
section2.item2: Services are provided through a web browser, and some functions may be limited depending on the browser type and version.
section2.item3: The site may change the service contents without prior notice to improve the service.

section3.title: 3. User's Obligations
section3.item1: Users must comply with relevant laws and regulations and the provisions of these terms when using the service.
section3.item2: Users may not reproduce or distribute information obtained through the service without permission.
section3.item3: Users must not engage in any act that interferes with the stable operation of the service.

section4.title: 4. Disclaimer
section4.item1: The site is not responsible for any damages arising from the use of the free services provided.
section4.item2: The site is not responsible for service interruption due to natural disasters, technical defects, etc.
section4.item3: Users are responsible for the use of the results generated through the tools provided by the site.

section5.title: 5. Copyright
section5.content: The copyright for all services, information, and designs provided by the site belongs to the site. Users may use the services for non-commercial purposes, but may not use them commercially without the consent of the site.

section6.title: 6. Changes to Terms
section6.content: The site may change the terms if necessary, and the changed terms will be announced through the site. Users who do not agree to the changed terms may stop using the service.

section7.title: 7. Dispute Resolution
section7.content: Disputes arising from the use of the service shall be handled in accordance with relevant laws and regulations, and in the event of a dispute, both parties shall make efforts to resolve the dispute through mutual consultation.
